lom:description.lom:string: This BPC Demonstration Project leverages the appeal of online multi-user virtual worlds to engage tweens, teens, and young adults in learning-by-doing in a service learning environment. Cornell has developed a new course, Virtual Worlds, in Computing and Information Science for non-majors. Students enrolled in this course will explore basic concepts of networked computing over the internet within the framework of developing and conducting online outreach to minority and disadvantaged youth in after school settings at remote sites.

lom:title.lom:string: BPC-DP: Worlds for Information Technology and Science (WITS)
